title: List of Sovereign States
desc: The following is a list providing an overview of sovereign states around the world with information on their status and recognition of their sovereignty. The 206 listed states can be divided into three categories based on membership within the United Nations System: 193 UN member states, 2 UN General Assembly non-member observer states, and 11 other states.

countries.info: The de facto ruling government, the  Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, has not been recognized by any state. The United Nations continues to recognize the  Islamic Republic of Afghanistan as the government of Afghanistan.

Andorra is a co-principality in which the office of head of state is jointly held ex officio by the French president and the bishop of the Roman Catholic diocese of Urgell, who himself is appointed with approval from the Holy See.
Antigua and Barbuda is a Commonwealth realm with one autonomous region, Barbuda.
Argentina is a federation of 23 provinces and one autonomous city.
Armenia is not recognized by Pakistan due to the dispute over Artsakh.

Australia is a Commonwealth realm and a federation of both states and territories. There are six states, three internal territories, six external territories and one claimed Antarctic external territory. The external territories of Australia are:
Member of the European Union. Austria is a federation of nine states.
Azerbaijan contains one autonomous region, Nakhchivan. The de facto state of Artsakh has been established in the southwest of Azerbaijan.
The Bahamas is a Commonwealth realm.

Many states rescinded their recognition of President Alexander Lukashenko following the disputed 2020 election. Lithuania currently recognizes Sviatlana Tsikhanouskaya's Coordination Council as the legitimate government of Belarus.
Member of the EU. Belgium is a federation of three linguistic communities and three regions.
Belize is a Commonwealth realm.
Bosnia and Herzegovina has two constituent entities:
Brazil is a federation of 26 states and one federal district.
Member of the EU.
Canada is a Commonwealth realm and a federation of ten provinces and three territories.
Chile has one special territory, Easter Island.

countries.info: China contains five autonomous regions, Guangxi, Inner Mongolia, Ningxia, Tibet, and Xinjiang. Additionally, it has sovereignty over the Special Administrative Regions of:
Comoros is a federation of three islands.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU. The northeastern part of the island is the de facto state of Northern Cyprus.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU. The Kingdom of Denmark includes 2 self-governing territories:
Member of the EU.
Ethiopia is a federation of eleven regions and two chartered cities.
Fiji contains one autonomous region, Rotuma.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU. France contains five overseas regions/departments; French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mayotte, and Réunion. France also includes the overseas territories of:
Georgia contains two autonomous republics, Adjara and Abkhazia. In Abkhazia and South Ossetia, de facto states have been formed.
Member of the EU. Germany is a federation of 16 states.
Member of the EU. Greece contains one autonomous area, Mount Athos.
Grenada is a Commonwealth realm.
Member of the EU.
India is a federation of 28 states and eight union territories.
Indonesia has eight autonomous provinces, Aceh, Jakarta, Central Papua, Highland Papua, Papua, South Papua, West Papua, and Yogyakarta.
Iraq is a federation of 19 governorates, four of which make up the autonomous Kurdistan Region.
Member of the EU.

Israel exerts strong control over the territory claimed by Palestine. It has annexed East Jerusalem, an act not recognized by the international community. Israel has varying levels of control over the rest of the West Bank, and although it ended its permanent civilian or military presence in the Gaza Strip, it is still considered to be the occupying power under international law.
Member of the EU. Italy has 5 autonomous regions, Aosta Valley, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Sardinia, Sicily and Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol.
Jamaica is a Commonwealth realm.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU.
Malaysia is a federation of 13 states and three federal territories.
Member of the EU.
Under Compact of Free Association with the United States.
Mauritius has an autonomous island, Rodrigues.
Mexico is a federation of 31 states and one autonomous city.
Under Compact of Free Association with the United States. The Federated States of Micronesia is a federation of four states.
Moldova has the autonomous regions of Gagauzia and the Left Bank of the Dniester. The latter and a city Bender (Tighina), is under the de facto control of Transnistria.
Part of the Moroccan-claimed Western Sahara is controlled by the partially recognized Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic.

countries.formal_name: Republic of the Union of Myanmar
countries.info: Wa State is a de facto autonomous state within Myanmar. The United Nations has not recognized the de facto ruling government of Myanmar, the State Administration Council.
Nepal is a federation composed of 7 provinces.
Member of the EU. The Kingdom of the Netherlands includes four areas with substantial autonomy:
New Zealand is a Commonwealth realm, and has one dependent territory and one claimed Antarctic dependent territory:
Nicaragua contains two autonomous regions, Atlántico Sur and Atlántico Norte.
Nigeria is a federation of 36 states and one federal territory.

countries.info: North Korea is not recognized by seven UN members, Botswana, Estonia, France, Israel, Japan, the United States, and South Korea, the last of which claims to be the sole legitimate government of Korea.
Norway has two unincorporated areas in Europe:

Pakistan is a federation of four provinces and one capital territory. Pakistan exercises control over certain portions of Kashmir, but has not officially annexed any of it, instead regarding it as a disputed territory. The portions that it controls are divided into two territories, administered separately from Pakistan proper: Azad Kashmir Gilgit-Baltistan Azad Kashmir describes itself as a "self-governing state under Pakistani control", while Gilgit-Baltistan is described in its governance order as a group of "areas" with self-government. These territories are not usually regarded as sovereign, as they do not fulfil the criteria set out by the declarative theory of statehood (for example, their current laws do not allow them to engage independently in relations with other states). Several state functions of these territories (such as foreign affairs and defense) are performed by Pakistan.
Under Compact of Free Association with the United States.

countries.membership: UN General Assembly observer state; member of two UN specialized agencies
countries.info: The State of Palestine, declared in 1988, is not recognized as a state by Israel but has received diplomatic recognition from 139 states. The proclaimed state has no agreed territorial borders, or effective control over much of the territory that it proclaimed. The Palestinian National Authority is an interim administrative body formed as a result of the Oslo Accords that exercises limited autonomous jurisdiction within the Palestinian territories. In foreign relations, Palestine is represented by the Palestine Liberation Organization. The State of Palestine is a member state of UNESCO,[ UNIDO and other international organizations.

countries.formal_name: Independent State of Papua New Guinea
countries.info: Papua New Guinea is a Commonwealth realm with one autonomous region, Bougainville.
The Philippines contains one autonomous region, Bangsamoro.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU. Portugal contains two autonomous regions, the Azores and Madeira.
Member of the EU.

Russia is a federation of 83  internationally recognized federal subjects (republics, oblasts, krais, autonomous okrugs, federal cities, and an autonomous oblast). Several of the federal subjects are ethnic republics.

countries.formal_name: Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis
countries.info: Saint Kitts and Nevis is a Commonwealth realm and is a federation of two islands, St. Kitts and Nevis.
Saint Lucia is a Commonwealth realm.
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines is a Commonwealth realm.

countries.formal_name: Democratic Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe
countries.info: São Tomé and Príncipe contains one autonomous province, Príncipe.
Serbia contains two autonomous regions, Vojvodina and Kosovo and Metohija. The latter is under the de facto control of Kosovo.
Member of the EU.
Member of the EU.
Solomon Islands is a Commonwealth realm.
Somalia is a federation of six states. Two, Puntland and Galmudug, have self-declared autonomy, while one, Somaliland, is de facto independent.

countries.info: South Korea has one autonomous region, Jeju Province.
South Sudan is a federation of 10 states and three administrative areas.
Member of the EU. Spain is divided into 17 autonomous communities and two special autonomous cities.

countries.formal_name: Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka

countries.info: Sudan is a federation of 18 states.
Member of the EU.
Switzerland is a federation of 26 cantons.

The Syrian National Coalition, which is recognized as the legitimate representative of the Syrian people by 20 UN members, has established an interim government to rule rebel controlled territory during the Syrian civil war.
Tajikistan contains one autonomous region, Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Province.
Tanzania contains one autonomous region, Zanzibar.
Trinidad and Tobago contains one autonomous region, Tobago.
Tuvalu is a Commonwealth realm.

Ukraine contains one autonomous region, the Autonomous Republic of Crimea, which is under the control of Russia. Five other areas of Ukraine are under full or partial Russian control, including Donetsk, Kherson, Luhansk, Sevastopol, and Zaporizhzhia.
The United Arab Emirates is a federation of seven emirates.

countries.formal_name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
countries.info: The United Kingdom is a Commonwealth realm consisting of four constituent countries; England, Northern Ireland, Scotland, and Wales. The United Kingdom has the following 13 overseas territories and one claimed Antarctic dependent territory:

The United States is a federation of 50 states, one federal district, and one incorporated territory. Additionally, the Federal government of the United States has sovereignty over 13 unincorporated territories. Of these territories, the following five are inhabited possessions:
Uzbekistan contains one autonomous region, Karakalpakstan.

countries.membership: UN General Assembly observer state under the designation of "Holy See"; member of three UN specialized agencies
countries.info: Administered by the Holy See, a sovereign entity with diplomatic relations to 183 states. This figure consists of 180 UN member states, the Cook Islands, the Republic of China (Taiwan), and the State of Palestine. In addition, the European Union and the Sovereign Military Order of Malta maintain diplomatic relations with the Holy See. The Holy See is a member of three UN specialized agencies (ITU, UPU, and WIPO) and the IAEA, as well as being a permanent observer of the UN (in the category of "Non-member State") and multiple other UN System organizations. The Vatican City is governed by officials appointed by the Pope, who is the Bishop of the Diocese of Rome and ex officio sovereign of Vatican City.
Venezuela is a federation of 23 states, one capital district, and federal dependencies.
